tool_description: Our Zalando Data Service API provides real-time data about product details and keyword search result from the online shop Zalando.de and Zalando.co.uk..
name: Axesso - Zalando Data Service
title: Axesso - Zalando Data Service

api_list.name: Keyword search

optional_parameters.name: mainCat
optional_parameters.description: Category used for the search, valid values are \"katalog\" (default), \"damen\", \"herren\" and \"kinder\".

optional_parameters.name: sortBy
optional_parameters.description: Default is \"most-popular\" (if left blank), other valid values are \"activation-date\",  \"price-asc\", \"price-desc\" and \"sale\".

api_list.name: Product Details
